department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Remediation work at Lot 512, Iqaluit, Nunavut.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Lot 512 Remediation
## Request for Proposal
### Tender Information
**Title**: Lot 512 Remediation
**Reference Number**: PW-NCS-026-12313
**Solicitation Number**: ET022-230722/A
**Tender Closing Date**: September 27, 2022, 15:00:00
**Regions of Delivery**: Nunavut Territory
### Getting Started
* Deadline for submission: September 27, 2022, 15:00:00
* The government reserves the right to negotiate the terms of a contract
### Specific Tender Details
* Environmental remediation services at Lot 512 in Iqaluit, Nunavut
* Eleven test pits revealed petroleum hydrocarbon impacts exceeding CCME guidelines for residential/parkland land use
* An estimated 1,145 cubic meters of impacted soil will be removed
* Suppliers must be registered on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR)
* Temporary COVID-19 health and safety measures are in place at the Western Region Bid Receiving Unit
* Suppliers are encouraged to submit electronic bids using Postes Canada's epost Connect service
### Requirements and Conditions
* Bids in either official language of Canada are acceptable
* Suppliers may not submit hard copy bids in person or via mail/courier
* Faxed bids are accepted at 1-418-566-6167
* Payment terms: to be negotiated
* Documents may be attached in either official language of Canada
### Contact Information
* Danielle Graham, Procurement Officer
* Phone: (204) 292-2872
* Fax: (418) 566-6167
* Email: Danielle.Graham@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
### Additional Materials
* Documents for the tender can be found at the following links:
  * https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/02/7837934bc41a80b3b58d1bc57a0462a3/ABES.PROD.PW_NCS.B026.E12313.EBSU000.PDF
  * https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/02/abb2aef965977eca0ab1e34243f8d922/ABES.PROD.PW_NCS.B026.E12313.ATTA1.PDF
